Automatic notifications of where your family and friend are located.âââââ Coooeee does NOT use sms to send or receive information! âââââ Coooeee is a full service application that uses sophisticated client/server technology.âââââ Coooeee is Free! âââââ Coooeee has Extended Privacy Settingsâââââ Check us out at http://www.coooeee.com/âââââ Try it now! It's FREE Stay connected with your family & friends at all times. Receive automatic alerts when family & friends are nearby or when they are within your pre-set zones. This enables you to know when your family members or friends reach any destination that you want without them having to call or text you. And this is all automatic. Follow your family & friends while they are on the go. This will enable you to see where they are right now and where they are going instantly.You can even use a GPS Tracker to be alerted when your car is on the move without you! or even monitor where your pets are or where they have been.Set up your own zones in seconds with the unique Coooeee Edit Zone featureSay good bye to âwhere are you?â or "I've arrived" text messages and phone calls!Coooeee will enable you to keep a safe eye on family, friends, pets, cars or any other asset.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I think this is a great app with my Galaxy S4!  When will it be available for iPhones?
reviews.author: Brian Fletcher

reviews.title: HTC ONE X
reviews.comment: hi its good but i can\'t find how to add people to it on my htc one x
reviews.author: Kaloyan Nikolov

reviews.title: Constant alerts when traveling with family
reviews.comment: Set up a zone to know when the kid is home from school, our primary use for the app.  This feature works very well.  The only problem I have found with the app is when our family is traveling in the same vehicle, all of our phones continuously alert that our group is in the same zone.  This quickly gets annoying and drains battery.  Hiding ourself from the group ceases the constant alerts but also stops updating locations.  Have emailed developer for suggestions.
reviews.author: Steve Bratton

reviews.title: Dinner not burnt
reviews.comment: Fab. Track the missus or just wait for the zone alert before cooking dinner. Make sure the kids are safe on long journeys without having to rely on them texting. Set zones up when out so your partner knows you have arrived at zones like station and then work. Used for approximately 6 weeks. Love it. More importantly so does the other half.
reviews.author: stuart hawkes

reviews.title: Crashing on Moto Razr
reviews.comment: App was working fine the other night, but opened it this morning and it crashes after about 5 seconds. Please fix. Otherwise, this is a fantastic app.
reviews.author: Paul B

reviews.title: Coooeee
reviews.comment: Perfect for me. Samsung Galaxy s3
reviews.author: Peter E. Limbu

reviews.title: Wow! Zone alerts awesome
reviews.comment: This is way cool it tells me when my mates are near. Or in da pub lol!!!!  Motorola xoom
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Misleading
reviews.comment: I am a developer so I understand that apps usually need to make money but when your description says \'FREE\' yet I go to do some of the functionality that you talk about and I have to \'pay to add functions\' that is BS.  Either make your app truly free or change your description to reflect its actual use under free and add-ons  Update:  Again I am not against an app making money and by all means try to avoid ads (ads = death) but your description should clearly state what is possible with your app (free version) and then list out what may require fees.
reviews.author: Jason Haffey

reviews.title: Sg3
reviews.comment: Doesnt work.. didnt even get the email.
